name: Candy Thieves: Tale of Gnomes
storyline:
You inherit a strange box that is actually an inter-dimensional candy factory. How did this happen? Where are the gnomes coming from? Play the game to find out!

Who are these cute little shapeless jellies? Who cares? Stuff them into your factory right away to get super-tasty candies! First gnome’s barely arrived, and here’s a second one already!

Without even asking permission, the entire line grabs your candy one by one and rushes off in all directions. Simple persuasion is unlikely to get them to leave. You need strong defenses and proven tactics!

These gnomes will do anything to get your candy. Smash them, throw them, zap them – do whatever it takes!

Nah, none of this is fatal. The creatures pouring out of the portals are just soap replicas of the little misers, who want to cram their storehouses full of sweet caramel candies. So they’re taking them from you. Without asking!

What a mess! Our hero’s grandfather has gone missing, and a terrible disease spreads across the gnome world. What if this is all connected? Find out more about what happened... and fix it!
summary: Candy Thieves: Tale of Gnomes is a dynamic strategy adventure game about making delicious candies and protecting them from impudent thieving gnomes, legendary misers known for their greed.
